duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepares wafers for experimentation to include cleaning, loading wafers, preparing reactor for experimentation and cleaning reactors.
Evaluates performance of process system and prepares cross section samples for scanning electron microscope (SEM) analysis.
Operates reactor to perform thin film process and operates scanning electron microscope (SEM) for analysis.
Records process conditions and experimental observations, and prepares graphs and tables summarizing results.
Orders equipment and supplies, coordinates with vendors and purchasing, and performs routine shut down procedures.
Coordinates instrument repair and maintenance, and sets up equipment for experiments, using quantitative wafer evaluation and process instrumentation knowledge.
Provides informal guidance and support to more junior team members and provides solutions to problems in atypical situations.
Impacts the quality of own work and its contribution to the team, and utilizes communication skills to regularly exchange information.
